item.title: Alligator River Drawbridge
item.description:
Schedule:
Opens on signal, 24 hours a day.
Bridge Details:
  • Location: On US 64, at Columbia, Tyrrell County
  • Bridge Phone: 252-796-7261
  • Radio Call Sign: KU6047
  • Office Information:
    • Supervisor: Guy White
    • Phone: 252-797-4468
    • Location: Creswell

item.title: Pamlico River Drawbridge
item.description:
Schedule:
Opens only upon 24 hour advance notice.
Bridge Details:
  • Location: On US 17, at Washington, Beaufort County
  • Bridge Phone: Contact Bridge Supervisor
  • Radio Call Sign: none
  • Office Information:
    • Supervisor: Gary McSweeney
    • Phone: 252-946-8070
    • Fax: 252-946-4786
    • Location: Washington

item.title: Pasquotank River Drawbridge
item.description:
Schedule:
The draw shall open on signal, except that between 7:00 a.m. and 9:00 a.m., and 4:00 p.m. and 6:00 p.m., Monday through Friday, the draw need open only at 7:30 a.m., 8:30 a.m., 4:30 p.m., and 5:30 p.m. for any pleasure vessels waiting to pass.
Bridge Details:
  • Location: On US 158, at Elizabeth City, Pasquotank County
  • Bridge Phone: 252-331-4772
  • Radio Call Sign: KX7476
  • Office Information:
    • Supervisor: Randy Williams
    • Phone: 252-331-4763
    • Location: Elizabeth City

item.title: Perquimans River Drawbridge
item.description:
Schedule:
  • April 1st thru Sept. 30th - Opens on the hour from 8:00a.m. to 12:00a.m.
  • October 1st thru March 31st - Opens on the hour from 10:00a.m. to 10:00p.m.
Bridge Details:
  • Location: On US 17, at Hertford, Perquimans County
  • Bridge Phone: 252-426-7241
  • Radio Call Sign: none
  • Office Information:
    • Supervisor: Randy Williams
    • Phone: 252-331-4763
    • Location: Elizabeth City

item.title: Cunningham Bridge over the Trent River
item.description:
Schedule:
  • Need not open from 6:30 a.m. to 8:30 a.m. and from 4:00 p.m. to 6:00 p.m., Monday through Friday, for pleasure vessels. However, the draw shall open at 7:30 a.m. and 5:00 p.m. for any vessel waiting to pass.
  • Need not open from 2:00 p.m. to 7:00 p.m. from May 24 through September 8, on Sundays and Federal holidays, for pleasure vessels. However, the draw shall open at 4:00 p.m. and 6:00 p.m. for any vessel waiting to pass.
  • Must always open on signal for public vessels of the United States.
  • Shall open on signal at all other times.
Bridge Details:
  • Location: The draw of the U.S. 70 bridge, mile 0.0, at New Bern
  • Bridge Phone: 252-633-4799
  • Radio Call Sign: None
  • Office Information:
    • Supervisor: Robert Corey
    • Phone: 252-514-4724
    • Location: New Bern

item.title: Beaufort Channel Drawbridge
item.description:
Schedule:
  • The draw opens on the hour and 1/2 hour from 6 a.m to 10 p.m.
  • Monday - Friday the draw need not open between the hours of 6:30 a.m. to 8 a.m. and 4:30 p.m. to 6 p.m.
  • The draw opens on signal from 10 p.m. to 6 a.m.
Bridge Details:
  • Location: On US 70, at Beaufort, Carteret County
  • Bridge Phone: 252-728-3279
  • Radio Call Sign: KA97359
  • Office Information:
    • Supervisor: Brad N. Price
    • Phone: 252-514-4724
    • Location: New Bern

item.title: Harker's Island Drawbridge
item.description:
Schedule:
Opens on signal, 24 hours a day.
Bridge Details:
  • Location: On SR 1335, at Beaufort, Carteret County
  • Bridge Phone: 252-728-3581
  • Radio Call Sign: KA97363
  • Office Information:
    • Supervisor: Robert Corey
    • Phone: 252-514-4724
    • Location: New Bern

item.title: Cape Fear Memorial Drawbridge
item.description:
Schedule:
Opens on signal, 24 hours a day.
Note: From 8 a.m. to 10 a.m. on the second Saturday of July of every year and from 7 a.m. to 11 a.m. on the second Sunday of November of every year, the draw need not open for vessels.
Bridge Details:
  • Location: On US 17, at Wilmington, New Hanover County
  • Bridge Phone: 910-251-5773
  • Radio Call Sign: KQU609
  • Office Information:
    • Supervisor: Eric Britt
    • Phone: 910-371-2372
    • Location: Wilmington

item.title: NE Cape Fear Drawbridge
item.description:
Schedule:
  • Commercial Vessels: Opens on signal, 24 hours a day.
  • Pleasure Craft: Opens at 10a.m. and 2p.m. and upon signal from 6 p.m. to 6 a.m.
Note: From 8 a.m. to 10 a.m. on the second Saturday of July of every year and from 7 a.m. to 11 a.m. on the second Sunday of November of every year,the draw need not open for vessels.
Bridge Details:
  • Location: On US 117, at Wilmington, New Hanover County
  • Bridge Phone: 910-251-5774
  • Radio Call Sign: KU6050
  • Office Information:
    • Supervisor: Eric Britt
    • Phone: 910-371-2372
    • Location: Wilmington

item.title: Smith's Creek Drawbridge
item.description:
Schedule:
Need not open for vessels.
Bridge Details:
  • Location: On US 117, at Wilmington, New Hanover County
  • Bridge Phone: Contact Bridge Supervisor
  • Radio Call Sign: none
  • Office Information:
    • Supervisor: Eric Britt
    • Phone: 910-371-2372
    • Location: Wilmington

item.title: Surf City Drawbridge
item.description:
Schedule:
The draw shall open on signal, except that from 7:00 a.m. to 7:00 p.m. the draw shall open for pleasure craft if signaled only on the hour.
Bridge Details:
  • Location: On NC 50, over Intracoastal Waterway, Pender County
  • Bridge Phone: 910-328-4291
  • Radio Call Sign: KU6044
  • Office Information:
    • Supervisor: Eric Britt
    • Phone: 910-371-2372
    • Location: Wilmington

item.title: Wrightsville Beach Drawbridge
item.description:
Schedule:
  • The draw shall open on signal, except that from 7:00 a.m to 7:00 p.m. the draw shall open for pleasure craft if signaled only on the hour.
  • Except that from 7 a.m. to 11 a.m. on the third and fourth Saturday in September of every year, the draw need not open for vessels due to the Triathlon run.
Bridge Details:
  • Location: On US 74, over Intracoastal Waterway, New Hanover County
  • Bridge Phone: 910-256-2886
  • Radio Call Sign: KU6043
  • Office Information:
    • Supervisor: Eric Britt
    • Phone: 910-371-2372
    • Location: Wilmington
